content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) and inserter (position y1) that inserts iron ore into the stone furnace
- Stone furnace (position x2) and inserter (position y2) that inserts iron ore into the stone furnace
- Stone furnace (position x3) and inserter (position y3) that inserts coal into the stone furnace

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces are not already full before inserting items. Check the current inventory of the furnaces to avoid unnecessary insertions.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnaces have enough items to extract. Verify the output inventory of the furnaces before extraction to prevent errors.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh the entity data to ensure that you are working with the most current information. Avoid actions based on outdated or stale data.
